function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased data collection from IoT devices may lead to privacy concerns and data sharing issues.","Impact":"Compromised patient privacy, data breaches, and infringement of data protection regulations.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection policies, secure data storage, and ensure compliance with privacy regulations.","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, blockchain, and secure data management systems.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and data subjects.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and data management teams."},{"Description":"Global data sharing and management may conflict with various countries' laws and regulations, leading to legal challenges and regulatory non-compliance.","Impact":"Legal disputes, regulatory fines, and hindrance in global data sharing efforts.","Mitigation":"Establish standardized protocols, comply with source country regulations, and promote global data governance frameworks.","Technologies":"Data compliance software, legal frameworks, and global data governance platforms.","People":"Legal experts, policymakers, and healthcare organizations.","Owner":"Legal and compliance teams, global data governance bodies."},{"Description":"Limited accessibility of healthcare data to a select group of users may raise concerns of data equity and inclusivity.","Impact":"Unequal access to healthcare data, biased decision-making, and limited transparency in data usage.","Mitigation":"Promote data accessibility for a diverse group of stakeholders, implement data equity policies, and ensure transparency in data access.","Technologies":"Data accessibility tools, AI algorithms for bias detection, and data governance platforms.","People":"Diverse stakeholders, healthcare consumers, and marginalized communities.","Owner":"Data governance teams, policy advocates, and healthcare organizations."}]}
